subject: Re: Hoping for Release of 4.11
messageBody:
Excellent! Many thanks

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
>
> At this point, Marc Philipp has stepped up and is spinning a beta release.
> I believe he's just waiting on release notes feedback from, well, me. You
> can follow along at
>
> https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/512
>
> Once documentation has settled out, we will probably have several weeks of
> beta testing, and then release.
>
> David Saff
>
>
> On Fri, Oct 5, 2012 at 10:47 AM, Philip Gilli√üen <furtelwart@...>wrote:
>
> > **
> >
> >
> > Hi ralthor,
> >
> > I am currently waiting for 4.11, too, because of named Parameterized
> > Tests.
> > I took a snapshot of JUnit and uploaded it into our Nexus. So I was
> > able to have named tests before the release. I didn't have any problems
> > with my current tests, so try it.
> >
> > Kind regards,
> > Philip
> >
> >
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
